Package com.example.donotredeem

Class MainPage

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.donotredeem.MainPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, FilterFragment.FilterMoodListener, Serializable
public class MainPage extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment implements FilterFragment.FilterMoodListener, Serializable
Fragment displaying a feed of followed users' public mood events with filtering and pagination capabilities. Handles real-time updates from Firestore and maintains multiple list states for UI interactions.
See Also:

    • onDestroyView

      public void onDestroyView()
      Fragment lifecycle callback that cleans up filter preferences when the view is destroyed. Ensures stale filters don't persist between fragment instances by: - Clearing SharedPreferences filter values - Resetting keyword, time, and emoji filters
      Overrides:
      onDestroyView in class androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
